name: 2.3.0.Final
body:
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**] Implement mode to use the canonical has in the ccompat API [#2792](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2792)
- [**component/registry**][**priority/high**][**area/rest-api**] Avoid returning 500 when downloading of artifact from URL fails [#2758](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2758)
- [**component/registry**][**area/rest-api**][**area/rules**][**area/auth**] Allow non-admin users to read global rules [#2756](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2756)
- [**Bug**][**Impacts Documentation**][**component/registry**] Authenticated Read Access feature only makes sense if Role Based Authorization is enabled [#2743](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2743)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**][**area/rest-api**] GroupMetadata not created when a new artifact is created [#2741](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2741)
- [**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Trying to register a schema which references twice the same complex type throws SchemaParseException [#2739](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2739)
- [**Bug**][**area/rest-api**] NullPointerException when bad request is sent [#2725](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2725)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] References are not passed into rulesService when applying rules for artifact updates. [#2703](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2703)
- [**Task**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] [tech-debt] UI linting rules [#2696](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2696)
- [**closed**] Question: Loss of data after one week (retention.ms) [#2684](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2684)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Not respected References order causes schemaParser failure [#2676](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2676)
- [**closed**] apicurio.registry.headers.enabled=false causes NullPointerException [#2663](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2663)
- [**closed**] Apicurio registry SQL version ENTRYPOINT ["<path/Script.sh>"] [#2658](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2658)
- [**closed**] Apicurio-Registry: Compatibility Rules are not applied on OpenAPI schemas [#2654](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2654)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Apicurio-registry: event sourcing events do not contain artifact type [#2648](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2648)
- [**closed**] NullPointerException in AbstractKafkaDeserializer when using serdes 2.2.5 [#2641](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2641)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Kafka Connect - Apicurio out of bounds exception. [#2637](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2637)
- [**Enhancement**][**Seeking Contribution**][**priority/low**][**area/rest-api**] ccompatv6 not compatible with Confluent registry [#2636](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2636)
- [**closed**] Environment variable to set topic name for event sourcing [#2630](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2630)
- [**Wontfix**][**component/registry**][**priority/low**] Importing lot of versions of a schema from KafkaSQL causes crash loop [#2627](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2627)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**] Update RHOSR /users/me endpoint to return "true" for the "viewer" role when anonymous reads option is enabled [#2616](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2616)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Error creating Artifact with ifExists query parameter [#2609](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2609)
- [**Discussion**][**component/registry**] Support Autorization Code Grant with PKCE [#2604](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2604)
- [**Question**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] APICurio Logs [#2590](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2590)
- [**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] AvroConverter & header. [#2589](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2589)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**] Validate references in serdes only if subschema is present [#2583](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2583)
- [**Bug**] Apicurio Rest Client did not work with custom truststores [#2581](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2581)
- [**closed**] io.apicurio.registry.rest.client.exception.RestClientException: PKIX path building failed:  [#2574](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2574)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Tenant Manager does not delete tenants in its table, only marks them as deleted [#2522](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2522)
- [**Documentation**][**Beginner Friendly**][**priority/low**] Create a comprehensive list of all available Registry configuration options [#2509](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2509)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Unable to access confluent compatible schema from apicurio ccompat v6 [#2498](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2498)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Registry crashed with "An illegal reflective access operation has occurred"` [#2470](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2470)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] NullPointerException while creating artifact on version 2.2.1.Final [#2362](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2362)
- [**Documentation**][**Task**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] kafkasql-journal topic creation fix in documentation [#2352](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2352)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Add support for References in Confluent Export utility [#2348](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2348)
- [**Enhancement**][**UI**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Allow artifact properties to be created/edited in the UI (from the Artifact Details page) [#2300](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2300)
- [**Enhancement**][**UI**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Display artifact properties on Artifact Details page [#2299](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2299)
- [**Enhancement**][**UI**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Add ability to search/filter list of dynamic properties in the Settings UI [#2255](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2255)
- [**Enhancement**][**UI**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Add ability to group dynamic properties together in the Settings UI [#2254](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2254)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Add CLI support for managing dynamic config properties [#2218](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2218)
- [**closed**] API unable to detect yaml format and artifact type [#2143](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2143)
- [**closed**] There is no way to know how my JSON Schema fails the compatibility rules [#2135](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2135)
- [**closed**] Resource leak while building the image from source in a container environment [#2100](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2100)
- [**Bug**][**UI**][**2.1.x**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Redoc not working with YAML [#2067](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2067)
- [**Enhancement**][**Beginner Friendly**] Support upload of schema definitons from URL [#1499](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1499)
- [**Enhancement**] Feature Request: add AsyncAPI Document tab in UI [#1011](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1011)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Passing sasl.jaas.config property seems impossible when starting apicurio-registry-storage-kafka-1.2.3.Final with Docker [#733](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/733)
